special_text:
[+1]: Surveil 3.
[-2]: You may cast target instant, sorcery, or Aura card from your graveyard this turn if that spell targets a creature you control. If an instant or sorcery spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
[-8]: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. Each of them is a 2/2 Zombie Ally in addition to its other types.
